question: Which date in the last {time} years recorded the {stats} {col} in the {city} ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    import datetime
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    year = datetime.datetime.now().year
    data = main_data[(main_data['city'] == "{code_city}") & (main_data['Timestamp'].dt.year >= (year - {code_time}))]
    data = data.dropna(subset="{code_col}")
    data = data.sort_values(by="{code_col}")
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["Timestamp"].date())


true_code()
